oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Last Few Segments From a Plantation Party program
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Various performances from the last few segments of a Plantation Party program.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Charlie Lyon and [Unidentified] announce a Bugler tobacco advertisement [incomplete] / (1:11) Tom, Dick, and Harry perform a comedy routine about Hawaii / (4:00) Michael Stewart and the Plantation Party cast perform "[Unidentified song]" / (5:10) Duke Of Paducah announces the closing statements with a Bugler tobacco advertisement / (6:02) Charlie Lyon talks [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Plantation party (Radio program); Lyon, Charles, 1903-1985
